item.content:encoded:
• User Notification Center support on Mountain Lion.
  • Retina Display support.
  • Highlight connection item in server tree when automatic join on invite settings is off.
  • Join invited channel when clicked on invitation notification.
  • Use Twitter API to get Twitter profile image URLs.
  • Fix a missing people bug in user list.
  • Fix a bug where settings in numeric text fields could not be saved correctly on Mountain Lion.
  • Fix a crashing bug when removing DCC connection.
  • Fix typo in preferences dialog.
  • Fix memory leaks.
